ValidationRule.description: This rule makes sure that HW-CM12 only goes with LIC-CM1-ENT and HW-CM22 only goes with LIC-CM2-ENT.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), $Profile.Name <> "Order Operations Admin", OR( AND(CM12_HW_Count__c>0, CM2_License_Count__c>0, CM1_License_Count__c=0), AND(CM22_HW_Count__c>0, CM1_License_Count__c>0, CM2_License_Count__c=0) ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Purchase") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are trying to move an opportunity to purchase with a mismatch between cameras licenses and hardware. HW-CM12 only goes with LIC-CM1-ENT and HW-CM22 only goes with LIC-CM2-ENT.
